sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import VideoEmbed from '../components/VideoEmbed'; const PublicPortfolio = ({ items, setView, isAdmin }) => { // Sort items by creation time (newest first for consistent Hero selection) // The createdAt field is a Firebase timestamp, accessed via .seconds const sortedItems = [...items].sort((a, b) => (a.createdAt?.seconds || 0) - (b.createdAt?.seconds || 0)); // The first item in the sorted list is always the showreel (Hero) const showreelItem = sortedItems.length > 0 ? sortedItems[0] : null; // The rest of the items are the projects list (starting from the second item) const projectItems = sortedItems.slice(1); // Placeholder for name and email in the static section const editorName = 'Your Name'; const editorEmail = 'your.email@example.com'; return ( <> {/* 1. Header and Navigation */}
{/* Logo/Name */} {editorName} FILMS {/* Navigation Links and Admin Button */}
About Work Contact {/* The Admin button is always handled by App.jsx, but we keep this here for visual structure */} {/* The Admin Login/Panel button will appear to the right of this nav bar content via App.jsx */}
{/* Content Container (Offset for fixed header) */}
{/* 1. Hero Section (Showcase Reel) */}

The Storyteller, The Editor.

Crafting compelling narratives from raw footage. I make videos *move*.

{showreelItem ? (
) : (

No Showreel Set. Administrator needs to add items.

)} View Featured Projects
{/* Divider for visual separation */}
{/* 2. About Section (Static Content) */}

About Me

I am a professional video editor with 5+ years of experience specializing in high-impact commercial content and cinematic storytelling. My passion lies in rhythm and pacing, ensuring every cut serves the narrative and keeps the viewer engaged. I'm proficient in Adobe Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, and After Effects.

From short-form social media ads to feature-length documentary trailers, I focus on delivering polished, ready-to-publish media. Let's create something unforgettable together.

{/* Divider */}
{/* 3. Portfolio / Work Section (Dynamic Content) */}

Selected Work & Projects

{projectItems.length > 0 ? ( projectItems.map((item) => (

{item.title} ({item.type === 'youtube' ? 'YouTube' : 'Google Drive'})

{item.description}

Details:

  • Client: {item.client || 'N/A'}
  • Duration: {item.duration || 'N/A'}
  • Tools: {item.tools || 'N/A'}
  • Year: {item.year || 'N/A'}
)) ) : (

No project items found.

)}

I am always updating this section. More work available upon request.

{/* Divider */}
{/* 4. Contact Section (Static Content) */}

Let's Discuss Your Next Project

Ready to bring your footage to life? I'm available for freelance projects and retainer contracts.

Email: {editorEmail}

Phone: (555) 123-4567

{/* Footer */}

© {new Date().getFullYear()} {editorName} Films. All Rights Reserved.

); }; export default PublicPortfolio;
